name: Avatar ZERO
fullSentence: What you choose is your avatar and yourself.
description: A game that is about choice, also only about choice.
content:
An interactive installation exploring how digital environments shape and reflect our sense of self. Through real-time audio visualization, participants witness their voices transformed into visual echoes that persist and interact with others in the space.

The project uses WebGL and WebAudio API to create a synesthetic experience where sound becomes sight. Every utterance creates a unique particle system that follows the laws of physics within the digital realm.
